art.author: coccimiglio
art.post: God have mercy on “non believers” and people who need a sign to believe in you. Please bless all the children of the violent world we live in and protect and maintain their innocence. Reading “Hevean is for REAL” is a confirmation for “believers” that Jesus is with us through our painful moments. Jesus always protect my family and I and guide our footsteps in the direction you Will us to go. Thank you for all the wonderful blessings in my life..
art.title: Akiane’s Jesus, Heaven is for Real and the Man in the Turin Shroud
